  • About Tom Healy

Books

What the Right Hand Knows

Animal Spirits

Healy is the author of two books of poetry: Animal Spirits, a collaboration with tattoo artist Duke Riley, and What the Right Hand Knows, a finalist for the 2009 L.A. Times Book Prize and the Lambda Literary Award. His poems have appeared in many journals and anthologies including The New York Times, Paris Review, Yale Review, Salmagundi, Boston Review, Drunken Boat, BOMB and many others
